dict.acceptation: 多样；种类；杂耍；变化，多样化；

sent.orig: ABC's new crop of comedies are what Variety, a trade magazine, calls "laughers"
sent.trans: ABC的新喜剧如交易杂志《Variety》说的，就是“搞笑的片子”

sent.orig: Cultivar Any agricultural or horticultural 'variety'. The term is derived from the words cultivated variety.
sent.trans: cultivar栽培品系：任何农业上或园艺学上的变种。这个词来源于栽培的变种。

sent.orig: Advanced plant 2000 a variety of, feral vertebrate 500 a variety of.
sent.trans: 高等植物2000多种，野生脊椎动物500多种。

sent.orig: Main crushing machinery, complete variety, quality, can crush variety of different materials, to achieve customer satisfaction.
sent.trans: 主营粉碎机械，品种齐全，品质优良，可粉碎多种不同性质物料，以达到客户满意。

sent.orig: Variety complete, a variety of styles, affordable price!
sent.trans: 品种齐全，款式多种，价格适中！
